properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 6:11AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Towaliga River near Juliette affecting Monroe County

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Echeconnee Creek near Byron affecting Bibb...Crawford...Houston
and Peach Counties

Ocmulgee River near Hawkinsville affecting Bleckley and Pulaski
Counties

Ocmulgee River near Abbeville affecting Dodge...Telfair and Wilcox
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Ocmulgee River near Hawkinsville.
* From this evening until further notice.
* At 4 AM Thursday the stage was 18.8 feet and rising.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 20 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Thursday evening and continue to
rise to near 28.3 feet by Monday early afternoon. Additional rises
are possible thereafter.
* At 23 feet, Minor flooding continues of roads on the southside of
Hawkinsville along Gooseneck Lane. With the flooding of Gooseneck Lane
residents are cutoff from reaching their homes. The water will be from
1 to 3 feet deep over the road.

At 26 feet, Moderate flooding begins with several homes surrounded by
flood waters and at least 3 homes begin flooding near Gooseneck Lane and
RiverView Road.
